sentences.sContent: Freddy the Pharisee: Rigid, narrow-minded, and legalistic, he has a rule for everything.
sentences.sCn: 弗雷迪 法利赛人：顽固，狭隘，墨守陈规，他对一切事物都制定了规则。

sentences.sContent: This week's episode brought back Freddy Rumsen hoping that Pond's cold cream would be his ticket back into the ad business.
sentences.sCn: 本周播放的这一集，弗雷迪•拉姆森重新出现在剧情里，他希望自己带来的旁氏冷霜的订单能帮他重回广告业。
